casebody.data:
Sanchez, et al.
v.
Cobblestone HOA of Clayton, Inc. 374A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2016 J. Matthew Waters, Attorney at Law, Hope Derby Carmichael, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cobblestone HOA Of Clayton, Inc. Tatita Sanchez, for Sanchez, Tatita M. Robert A. Spence, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Christopher, Frank. Dennis Draughon, for Draughon, Dennis, et al. Robert Sain, for Sain, Robert, et al. Vincent Franks, Jr., for Franks, Vincent (Jr.). Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Adam M. Beaudoin, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Community Associations Institute-North Carolina Chapter, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of December 2016 by Community Associations Institute-North Carolina Chapter, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
